name: Cave Runner (itch) (RyanTHECarpenter)
description:
Run, jump, and even jet pack your way through 3 levels! Collect all the gems to uncover the secrets of the cave. 

The first 2D platformer I ever made. It's very rough and there are many things I would change, and still could change for the future.

This is a midterm project for Columbia College Chicago's Game Engine Scripting course. Any assets used were used for educational purposes only.
